thread.section_title: The Standard, High Line - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Huge help at the front desk
thread.title_full: Huge help at the front desk - Review of The Standard, High Line, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ojs1342
title: Huge help at the front desk
text: Booked the room through a third party (not the best idea) so there was a small issue booking which was resolved in less then 10 mins by the lovely lady at the front named Monique! She was very dedicated to making sure everything was handled. She was a huge help and was patient with my girlfriend and I. Had to leave a review because most hotels we stay in don't go as smoothly as this one. Thanks again Monique !
